text: Approval for the pinnacle complete acetabular hip system. this device is indicated for: the pinnacle complete acetabular hip system is a single use device intended for uncemented fixation. the pinnacle complete acetabular hip system is intended as a primary joint replacement prosthesis in total hip arthroplasty for skeletally mature patients suffering at least moderate pain in the hip joint from non-inflammatory degenerative jointdisease (nidjd) and its composite diagnoses of osteoarthritis (oa) or post-traumaticarthritis.  Pinnacle complete acetabular hip system's inserts (pinnacle ultamet) are only intended for use with depuy's femoral and acetabular components having matching outer and inner diameters.
